title: BROADCAST JOURNALISM
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Arts or Social Science subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language and four (4) other subjects in Arts or Social Sciences.
subjects: Any three (3) from Arts or Social Science subjects.

title: FILM & TV PRODUCTION
utme_requirements: Five (5) credit passes at SSC or its equivalent in Mathematics, English Language and any other three (3)  from Arts, Science and Social Science subjects
subjects: Any three (3) subjects from Arts/Social Science/Physical Science.

title: MASS COMMUNICATION
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language.
subjects: Any three (3) Arts and Social Science subjects.

title: TELEVISION ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) credit passes at SSC or its equivalent in Mathematics, English Language and any other three (3)  from Arts, Science and Social Science subjects
subjects: Any three (3) subjects from Arts/Social Science/Physical Science.
